title: Bedcover, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool, linen
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
description: White cotton bedcover brocaded with colored wool in a pattern of small detached flower sprays in blue-green, dark pink and red. Remains of a pink stripe are visible. Fitted with a scalloped valance on two sides. Bound and lined with linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, late 18th century. Medium: cotton, wool, linen
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft. 1968-83-1.
